subject: Getting to know Inbox Zero
textBody:
We want to make your experience using Inbox Zero as rewarding as possible, so here are the top things our most successful users

Your AI Email Assistant

A personal assistant is amazing for managing email, but most of us can't spend $3,000 a month on one.

That's why we built the AI assistant. It does what a great PA would do - reads your emails, handles the routine stuff, and keeps

your inbox in check - just without the hefty price tag.

It's super easy to get going:

1. Pick a role that matches what you do (like Founder, Creator, or Investor). This will set you up with some common rules people

1. Tell it what you need, just like you'd tell a real assistant

1. Test it out right away to make sure it's doing exactly what you want

1. Adjust and fine-tune anytime - your assistant learns and adapts to your preferences

Some examples of what you can ask it to do:

*

Watch a demo of the AI Personal Assistant:  [

Set up your AI assistant [

Your inbox is filled with emails that don't need your attention. Reply Zero only shows you the ones that do.

We label your emails with:

* To Reply - emails you need to reply to

* Awaiting Reply - emails where you're waiting to hear back from others

Reply Zero works within Gmail or the Inbox Zero platform.

If you use the Reply Zero view within Inbox Zero, you'll only see the emails that need handling without any other noise.

We'll also send you a weekly email with any emails that are overdue.

Reply Zero has been a game-changer for how we manage email ourselves and makes sure we never miss a reply or to follow up.

Enable Reply Zero [

Bulk Unsubscriber

Our bulk unsubscriber shows you frequent emailers with a button to one-click unsubscribe.

We show you how often you read emails, making it easy to unsubscribe from the ones you never read.

It also lets you archive and delete all emails from a sender in a single click.

Unsubscribe from emails [

Cold Email Blocker

Keep sales people at the gate. Filter out cold emails from hitting your inbox.

The blocker checks every first-time sender against your criteria for what counts as a cold email. We've set up default filtering

that works great for most people, but you can easily customize it to match your preferences.

Turn on Cold Email Blocker [

Smart Categories

Smart Categories organize your emails by grouping similar senders together. This works perfectly with your AI assistant - tell it

once how to handle a category, and it'll take care of all future emails automatically.

Got a lot of newsletters? Just click

on the newsletter category and watch thousands of old emails clear out in

seconds. Then tell your AI assistant to automatically archive future newsletters, and you'll never have to deal with inbox clutter

Some examples of smart categories (but you can create any category you want):

* Newsletters

* Customers

* Investors

Set up smart categories [

Gain insights into your inbox to master your email management. Understand what is filling up your inbox and devise an effective

action plan.

If you'd like help getting set up, you can book a free 15 minute onboarding call:

Book Onboarding Call [

Prefer to chat over email? Reply to this email or message me at elie@getinboxzero.com [elie@getinboxzero.com]!

CEO, Inbox Zero

You are receiving this email because you opted-in to receive updates from Inbox Zero

Inbox Zero, New York
